channel.title: Triple Sec on Need a drink?
channel.description: Recent content in Triple Sec on Need a drink?

item.title: Between the sheets
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 30 ml brandy
  • 30 ml rum
  • 30 ml triple sec
  • 20 ml lemon juice
  • (garnish) orange twist

Instructions

  1. Shake ingredients.
  2. Serve in a cocktail glass.
  3. Garnish with orange twist.

item.title: Brandy crusta
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml brandy
  • 15 ml triple sec
  • 15 ml lemon juice
  • 10 ml Maraschino liqueur
  • 4 dashes aromatic bitters
  • (garnish) sugar
  • (garnish) lemon twist

Instructions

  1. Sugar rim a cocktail glass.
  2. Shake ingredients (Maraschino optional).
  3. Serve in cocktail glass.
  4. Garnish with long lemon twist lining the inside of the glass.

item.title: Corpse reviver no. 2
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 20 ml gin
  • 20 ml triple sec
  • 20 ml Lillet Blanc
  • 20 ml lemon juice
  • 4 dashes absinthe
  • (garnish) cocktail cherry

Instructions

  1. (Optional) rinse glass with absinthe.
  2. Shake ingredients.
  3. Serve in a cocktail glass.
  4. Garnish with a cocktail cherry.

item.title: Cosmopolitan
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml vodka (citron)
  • 30 ml triple sec
  • 30 ml lime juice
  • 15 ml cranberry juice
  • (garnish) lemon twist

Instructions

  1. Shake ingredients.
  2. Serve in a cocktail glass.
  3. Garnish with lemon twist.

item.title: Jasmine
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 45 ml gin
  • 30 ml triple sec
  • 20 ml Campari
  • 15 ml lemon juice
  • (garnish) lemon twist

Instructions

  1. Shake ingredients.
  2. Serve in a cocktail glass.
  3. Garnish with a lemon twist.

item.title: Margarita
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml tequila
  • 30 ml lime juice
  • 15 ml triple sec
  • (garnish) lime slice

Instructions

  1. Shake ingredients
  2. Serve in cocktail glass (rimmed with salt).
  3. Garnish with a lime slice.

item.title: Sidecar
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml brandy
  • 30 ml triple sec
  • 15 ml lemon juice
  • (garnish) orange twist

Instructions

  1. Shake ingredients.
  2. Serve in a cocktail glass.
  3. Garnish with an orange twist.

item.title: White lady
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 45 ml gin
  • 30 ml triple sec
  • 20 ml lemon juice
  • (garnish) lemon twist

Instructions

  1. Shake over ice.
  2. Serve in a cocktail glass.
  3. Garnish with lemon twist.
